org.jikesrvm.mm.mminterface

Class JMXSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.mm.mminterface.JMXSupport

  • public class JMXSupport
extends Object
    Provides methods supporting all JMX beans that relate to memory. Functionality for memory management beans generally requires interfacing with MMTk which is why this class belongs to the MMTk-VM interface.

    In JMX terms, the Jikes RVM provides only one memory manager (the garbage collector) and several memory pools (each of which corresponds to exactly one MMTk space).

    NOTE: Features related to memory usage are currently not implemented.

    • Field Summary

      private static String[] garbageCollectorNames

      private static String[] memoryManagerNames
      The names of all memory managers that are not garbage collectors.
      private static String[] poolNames 
      private static HashMap<String,Integer> pools
      Maps a space name to its index in the space array.

    • Field Detail

      • garbageCollectorNames

        private static final String[] garbageCollectorNames
        We only provide one garbage collector because the choice of garbage collector for the VM is fixed at build time.

      • memoryManagerNames

        private static final String[] memoryManagerNames
        The names of all memory managers that are not garbage collectors. All of our memory managers are collectors so this is empty.

      • pools

        private static HashMap<String,Integer> pools
        Maps a space name to its index in the space array.

      • poolNames

        private static String[] poolNames

      • lastMMTkVerbosity

        private static int lastMMTkVerbosity
        The level of verbosity that was used in MMTk when verbosity was switched off. It will be restored when verbosity is switched on again. We can do this because no other part of the system ever switches the verbosity.

      • fullyBootedVM

        public static void fullyBootedVM()
        Initializes data structures. This needs to called before the application starts.

      • getMemoryManagerNames

        public static String[] getMemoryManagerNames(String poolName)
        Parameters:
        poolName - the name of the pool
        Returns:
        the name of the memory manager(s) of the pool (always our single garbage collector, i.e. active plan)

      • getPoolNames

        public static String[] getPoolNames()

      • getType

        public static MemoryType getType(String poolName)
        Returns non-heap for immortal spaces and heap for non-immortal spaces because objects can be added and remove from non-immortal spaces.
        Parameters:
        poolName - the pool's name
        Returns:
        the type of the memory pool

        private static Space getSpace(String poolName)

        Returns:
        whether a space with the given name exists

      • setMMTkVerbose

        public static void setMMTkVerbose(boolean verbose)
        Sets the verbosity for MMTk. Verbosity in MMTk has several levels so this method makes an effort to save the previous verbosity level if possible.
        Parameters:
        verbose - true if verbosity is to be enabled, false otherwise
